it.polimi.ingsw.ps21.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps21.model.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to store the status of each player. It stores the following datas of a player:
  • Name
  • Cards (Territory Cards, Building Cards, Character Cards and Venture Cards)
  • Number of council privileges acquired during this Player's round
  • Socket
  • Properties: resources (wood, coins, servants, stones) and points (military points, victory points and faith points).
  • Modifiers of player's actions
Author:
fabri

      Properties getProperties()
      Returns an object that contains the values of the resources (stone, wood, servants and coins) and points (military points, faith points and victory points) of the player.

      • countCards

        public int countCards(CardType type)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns the number of the cards of a specified type owned by the player.
        Parameters:
        type - type of the cards to count. It can be a value of the CardType enum, except for EXCOMMUNICATION and LEADER. Accepted values are TERRITORY, BUILDING, CHARACTER and VENTURE.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when 'type' parameter is EXCOMMUNICATION, LEADER or not a member of the CardType enum.
